Package io.github.zero88.schedulerx.rxjava3.trigger

Class IntervalTriggerExecutor

java.lang.Object
io.github.zero88.schedulerx.rxjava3.trigger.IntervalTriggerExecutor
public class IntervalTriggerExecutor extends Object
Represents for the task executor has an execution loop based on interval.

NOTE: This class has been automatically generated from the original non RX-ified interface using Vert.x codegen.
